text: Akasaharu ra dharatika sabai vastu allahakai sampatti hun ra vastavama jasala'i timibhanda agadi grantha pradana gari'eko thiyo, tiniharula'i ra timila'i pani yahi adesa gari'eko cha ki allahasita dara manne gara? Ra yadi mandainau bhane (yadarakha ki) je jati akasaharuma ra prthvima cha, sabai allahakai ho. Ra allaha sabai avasyakataharubata mukta ra sampurna prasansita cha
